name: The Cave (itch) (benboy)
description:
This game was made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1. See more games here. Created with teammate Frain_x8

The Cave is a puzzle game inspired by games like Thomas Was Alone and Portal.  Use the different characters to go through unique puzzles with unique mechanics.

Character Abilities

Green - falls slowly

Blue - has opposite gravity

Yellow - normal

Orange - speedy with a bad jump

Please rate and tell me what you think!
